website_summaries.verdict: A delicious addition to many recipes, this beautiful olive oil with a golden hue is a pantry staple.
pros: Filippo Berio is a flavorful, simple olive oil
It makes a delicious addition to homemade pasta sauces and Caesar salad dressings
Keep in mind this is not an extra virgin oil, so it has a lighter taste and a different smoke point – making it better for pan frying
The oil is a beautiful golden color and comes in a small, easy-to-handle bottle
cons: While the small bottle is easier to use, you will run out quickly – we suggest buying in quantity

customer_reviews.title: My great grandmother, who came to the US from Italy
customer_reviews.text: Our family has been using Filippo Berio Olive oil for 60+ years in the making of tomato sauce for pasta and meatballs. My great grandmother, who came to the US from Italy, passed the recipe on. I have tried others, and you wouldn't think there would be much difference, but the FB tastes better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to make mayonnaise, Caesar dressing, for desserts and other recipes that you don’t want/need a strong olive oil flavor. The only thing I would like best is if it came in a glass bottle instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even notice the flavor. Couldn't find my regular olive oil on the shelves because of Covid19, so I probably won't reorder unless that is still the case. So, it's good enough for now.
customer_reviews.author: LaineyBell

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, But Comes in a Plastic Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big fan of olive oil that's been packed inside a plastic (as opposed to glass) bottle, but for the "add on" price, it was a good deal. I plan to transfer some of it to an empty glass bottle because it seems to keep better that way, especially in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: VIDFAN

customer_reviews.title: For Cooking
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil is what you want for cooking and baking. It doesn’t smoke when you sauté with it and won’t add strong flavor to baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: The Filippo Berio Olive Oil is light enough to handle ...
customer_reviews.text: The Filippo Berio Olive Oil is light enough to handle the jobs I need it for (pan grilling my fish, part of my salad dressing ingredients, body oil).
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Safer for your brain than EVOO
customer_reviews.text: Not supposed to cook above low heat with EVOO, as the resulting compounds do damage to your brain. Research it; Olive Oil is much better for you when sautéing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: High smoke temp
customer_reviews.text: So...this is what you use to cook with.... Very high smoke temp allowing for better pan cooking. But Extra Virgin is better when raw/direct (like dressings)
customer_reviews.author: Pappas

customer_reviews.title: What’s Not To Love?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fresh taste, good color and good price. What’s not to love? Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: darleneg20

customer_reviews.title: Its a monthly purchase for me and my roomate.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome for cooking or for a spread. and its half the price of the majority of store brand olive oils.
customer_reviews.author: Zac G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, But at a Premium
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with this except the price, which is normal if you want the best!
customer_reviews.author: Maximum Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Even if it isn't pure olive oil, it was pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Martinez

customer_reviews.title: came in with PLASTIC BOTTLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: i thought the oil will come in with glass bottle. and it actually came with PLASTIC BOTTLE. It's very bad for health since there might be sun exposure . I try to return the item but it's non-returnable!!! they should have said it in the description. be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Yu Chen

customer_reviews.title: Makes great mayo!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make mayo. The light flavor was perfect - subtle olive oil flavor without being bitter and overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pudas

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great olive oil. We switched to Olive oil several years ago and find Filippo is one of the best brands for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stricklett

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Great quality oil, I was very impressed. I will for sure be buying this again, if not in a higher quantity / larger amount.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made Sunday gravy and this oil worked excellent for the meats...very good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: nice and smooth....I drink an ounce or two, straight from the bottle, daily
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used this product all the time. Very healthy for you. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JEANETTE PROTENTIS

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking
customer_reviews.text: So many olive oils to choose from. Great for cooking. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Helsel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product! just what I wanted. will order again and again...
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works for eveyday cooking if you can get it cheap.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Olive oil was great for saute
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this oil for saute and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Filippo Berio Olive Oil, 25.3-Ounce
product_meta.description: Filippo Berio Olive Oil features mild hints of olive notes, making it a perfect complement to sautéing and grilling. The enhanced flavor and mid-range smoke point can be used for basting, sautéing, roasting, grilling, and more. Use with fish, poultry, meats and vegetables, or use to add a burst of flavor to sauces and dressings. The balance of flavors of Filippo Berio Olive Oil make it suitable for both the everyday home cook and top chefs in the culinary industry. Popular recipes include 10-Minute Zesty Salsa, Asian Crab Cakes, Baked Trout Fillets and Devilish Chicken, among many others. This product includes a single 25.3-ounce plastic bottle. For 150 years, Filippo Berio has honored our founder’s passion, artistry, and uncompromising commitment to excellence. Our olive oils carry our founder and namesake’s signature as a guarantee of quality and authenticity. These exquisite olive oils, crafted by using only the finest olives, help cooking enthusiasts all over the world create their own signature recipes that are both flavorful and healthful. Filippo Berio - The First & Last Name In Olive Oil.
feature_bullets: Best for Sautéing, Grilling and Roasting
Cholesterol Free, Trans Fat Free, Gluten Free, GMO Free, Sugar Free, and Sodium Free
